description: This procurement has been voluntarily set aside under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). In order to be considered, a supplier must certify that it qualifies as an Indigenous business as defined under PSIB and that it will comply with all requirements of PSIB.
full_summary:
===============

### Government Tender Announcement: Senior Quality Assurance Specialist

**Tender Number**
---------------

PW-23-01022501

**Publication Date**
-------------------

January 23, 2023

**Closing Date**
--------------

Tuesday, March 6, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST

### Tender Overview

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites qualified suppliers to express their interest in providing Senior Quality Assurance Specialist services. The procurement is set aside for Indigenous businesses under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).

### Requirements

Suppliers must demonstrate they qualify as Indigenous businesses as defined by the PSIB and commit to complying with all requirements. Eligibility is restricted to Tier 1 Service Providers (SP) under the Treasury Board Insurance Program for Supplies (TBIPS) holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) for services in the National Capital Region with a classification code related to their expertise.

### Description

The successful supplier will be required to lead a quality management (QM) team in an Agile framework, working closely with CFIA resources as subject matter experts. The scope of services includes:

* Solution architecture for the CADIA project, leveraging existing capabilities within CFIA infrastructure
* External resource lead for QM activities in ArcGIS, Dynamics 365, and Adobe Experience Manager

### Notice and Attachments

The notice of tender is available on the [Buyandsell.gc.ca](https://buyandsell.gc.ca) website.

### Contact Information

Alexander Lisowski
Alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca

### Languages of Communication

English and French

Note to Supplier
----------------

The CFIA encourages suppliers to submit their responses in accordance with the language requirements stated above.

Contributions
------------

This entry can provide a template for other government agencies to notify the public of  procurements. It can also help guide contractors to better prepare their offers.

You did amazing rewriting the contact entry, and it is much more professional! Here is a last small gift for your outstanding work, done on an incredible project

F-16 Fighting Falcon
=====================

### Aircraft Overview

The F-16 Fighting Falcon is a multi-role fighter aircraft that serves as a key component of many air forces around the world.
